attributes.action: Deport those who are caught insulting our sevice man and women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every country has Armed forces, they are there to protect and serve... no matter what they feel, it is their duty to crown and country.
Protestors who stand against our armed forces should be deported as they show no loyalty to the country they live in, or to the men and women who protect their familys or way of life.
These people who stand aginst our troops are standing against Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth and our goverement. 
All rights as a british civilian should be revoked and they should be deport to wherever is deemed fit!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
